head.title: Metro Briefing | New York: Westbury: 10 Charged In Drug Arrest

hedline.hl1: Metro Briefing | New York: Westbury: 10 Charged In Drug Arrest

block.p: Federal agents charged 10 people yesterday with selling crack cocaine in the Westbury area of Nassau County, prosecutors said. Seven of the suspects are members of the Bloods street gang, said Roslynn R. Mauskopf, the United States attorney in Brooklyn. Ms. Mauskopf said F.B.I. agents seized two handguns, material used to make and package crack, and an unknown amount of material believed to be crack and powdered cocaine. She said the arrests followed an eight-month investigation by the F.B.I. and local police officers.

Federal agents charged 10 people yesterday with selling crack cocaine in the Westbury area of Nassau County, prosecutors said. Seven of the suspects are members of the Bloods street gang, said Roslynn R. Mauskopf, the United States attorney in Brooklyn. Ms. Mauskopf said F.B.I. agents seized two handguns, material used to make and package crack, and an unknown amount of material believed to be crack and powdered cocaine. She said the arrests followed an eight-month investigation by the F.B.I. and local police officers.
